languages.text: "И теперь расплачиваюсь за это пошатнувшимся чувством равновесия — и прискорбной невозможностью хоть одним глазком взглянуть на ряженых лицемеров... А ведь прятки уже в разгаре!"

traits.locale_text: "И теперь расплачиваюсь за это пошатнувшимся чувством равновесия — и прискорбной невозможностью хоть одним глазком взглянуть на ряженых лицемеров... А ведь прятки уже в разгаре!"
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"
languages.original_text: "И теперь расплачиваюсь за это пошатнувшимся чувством равновесия — и прискорбной невозможностью хоть одним глазком взглянуть на ряженых лицемеров... А ведь прятки уже в разгаре!"

traits.locale_text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"
"And now I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance, and a depressing inability to participate in the Impostor Hunt..."
"And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"
"And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"
"And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"
"And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"
"And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"

languages.text: “是啊，我也为此付出了代价。我的身体再也不像以前那么灵巧，也没办法好好欣赏那些冒牌货巧妙的伪装……狩猎明明已经开始了！”
languages.original_text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我也为此付出了代价。我的身体再也不像以前那么灵巧，也没办法好好欣赏那些冒牌货巧妙的伪装……狩猎明明已经开始了！”

languages.text: «Y ahora pago el precio con un sentido del equilibrio afectado y una trágica incapacidad para admirar a los impostores... ¡en plena cacería!».
languages.original_text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora pago el precio con un sentido del equilibrio afectado y una trágica incapacidad para admirar a los impostores... ¡en plena cacería!».

languages.text: "Şimdi de bunun bedelini, bozulan bir dengeyle ve kılık değiştirmiş sahtekârlara hayranlık duyamama yetersizliğiyle ödüyorum... Üstelik av da tüm hızıyla devam ediyor!"
languages.original_text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi de bunun bedelini, bozulan bir dengeyle ve kılık değiştirmiş sahtekârlara hayranlık duyamama yetersizliğiyle ödüyorum... Üstelik av da tüm hızıyla devam ediyor!"

languages.text: 「そして今、私はその代償として心の平衡感覚を失い、変装した偽者たちを賞賛することすらできません…しかも、狩りはすでに本格化しています！」
languages.original_text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"

traits.locale_text: 「そして今、私はその代償として心の平衡感覚を失い、変装した偽者たちを賞賛することすらできません…しかも、狩りはすでに本格化しています！」

languages.text: « Et maintenant, j'en paie le prix avec un équilibre compromis et l'impossibilité d'admirer les imposteurs... Alors que la Chasse bat son plein ! »
languages.original_text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"

traits.locale_text: « Et maintenant, j'en paie le prix avec un équilibre compromis et l'impossibilité d'admirer les imposteurs... Alors que la Chasse bat son plein ! »

languages.text: "Und nun bezahle ich dafür mit einem beeinträchtigten Gleichgewicht und der bedauerlichen Unfähigkeit, die verkleideten Hochstapler zu bewundern ... Und die Jagd ist bereits in vollem Gange."
languages.original_text: "And now, I am paying for it with a compromised sense of balance and a regrettable inability to admire the disguised impostors... And the hunt is already in full swing!"

traits.locale_text: "Und nun bezahle ich dafür mit einem beeinträchtigten Gleichgewicht und der bedauerlichen Unfähigkeit, die verkleideten Hochstapler zu bewundern ... Und die Jagd ist bereits in vollem Gange."
